title: Full-width entry text with repositioned edit/delete buttons

requirements.text: In EntryCard.tsx, make the journal entry text display full width by removing any width constraints that cause it to share horizontal space with the edit/delete action buttons.

quotes: Can we make the entry text full width? We may need to move the edit delete buttons

acceptanceCriteria: The entry text area spans the full width of the card container
No horizontal space is shared between the entry text and the action buttons

requirements.text: In EntryCard.tsx, reposition the edit and delete buttons so they no longer sit inline beside the entry text. Place them in a dedicated row below the entry text (or as a compact toolbar at the bottom of the card) so they remain accessible without constraining text width.

quotes: We may need to move the edit delete buttons

acceptanceCriteria: Edit and delete buttons are visually separated from the entry text (below or in a footer row of the card)
Both buttons remain clearly visible and tappable
The layout looks correct in both light and dark themes

constraints: Do not change backend logic or data models
Do not modify files under frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, or frontend/src/components/ui
nonGoals: Redesigning the overall EntryCard visual style
Adding new entry actions or buttons
